mapper.sql: campaignId, portfolioid, name, budgetType, budget, startDate, endDate, servingStatus, state, spendingPolicy, bidOptimization, bidMultiplier, profileid, opttime
mapper.select: select campaignId from t_amz_adv_campaigns_hsa where profileid=#{profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select min(opttime) from t_amz_adv_campaigns_hsa where profileid=#{profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND adformat='video'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_amz_adv_campaigns_hsa (campaignId, profileid, portfolioid, name, budgetType, budget, startDate, endDate, state, bidding, brandEntityId, goal, productLocation, tags, costType, smartDefault, opttime) VALUES
( #{adv.campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.portfolioid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.budgetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.budget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adv.endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adv.state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.bidding,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.brandEntityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.goal,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.productLocation,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.tags,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.costType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.smartDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), budgetType = VALUES(budgetType), budget = VALUES(budget), startDate = VALUES(startDate), endDate = VALUES(endDate), state = VALUES(state), bidding = VALUES(bidding), brandEntityId = VALUES(brandEntityId), goal = VALUES(goal), productLocation = VALUES(productLocation), tags = VALUES(tags), costType = VALUES(costType), smartDefault = VALUES(smartDefault), opttime = VALUES(opttime)
mapper.select: select r.campaignId campaignId1, sum(attributedDetailPageViewsClicks14d) attributedDetailPageViewsClicks14d, sum(attributedOrdersNewToBrand14d) attributedOrdersNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedOrdersNewToBrandPercentage14d) attributedOrdersNewToBrandPercentage14d, sum(attributedOrderRateNewToBrand14d) attributedOrderRateNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedSalesNewToBrand14d) attributedSalesNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedSalesNewToBrandPercentage14d) attributedSalesNewToBrandPercentage14d, sum(attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrand14d) attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrandPercentage14d) attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrandPercentage14d, sum(unitsSold14d) unitsSold14d, sum(dpv14d) dpv14d from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_brand r where r.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.campaignId = #{campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by r.campaignId

select r.campaignId campaignId1, sum(viewableImpressions) viewableImpressions, sum(videoFirstQuartileViews) videoFirstQuartileViews, sum(videoMidpointViews) videoMidpointViews, sum(videoThirdQuartileViews) videoThirdQuartileViews, sum(videoCompleteViews) videoCompleteViews, sum(video5SecondViews) video5SecondViews, sum(video5SecondViewRate) video5SecondViewRate, sum(videoUnmutes) videoUnmutes, sum(vtr) vtr, sum(vctr) vctr from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_video r where r.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.campaignId = #{campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by r.campaignId

select CAST(t.campaignId AS CHAR) campaignId, CAST(t.profileid AS CHAR) profileid,p.name name, sum(t.impressions) impressionsPlacement,sum(t.clicks) clicksPlacement,sum(t.cost) costPlacement, ifnull((sum(t.cost) / sum(t.clicks)),0) avgcostPlacement, case when ifnull(sum(cost),0)>0 and ifnull(sum(sales),0)=0 then 10000000000 else ifnull((sum(cost) / sum(sales)),0) end ACOSPlacement, ifnull((sum(sales) / sum(t.cost)),0) ROASPlacement, ifnull(sum(sales) ,0) attributedSalesPlacement, ifnull(sum(purchases),0) attributedConversionsPlacement, sum(unitsSold) attributedUnitsOrderedPlacement, sum(sales) sumSalesPlacement, sum(unitsSold) sumUnitsPlacement, ifnull((sum(purchases) / sum(clicks)),0) CSRTPlacement from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_place t left join t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_place_attributed_all a on a.campaignId=t.campaignId and a.placementid =t.placementid and a.bydate=t.bydate left join t_amz_adv_rpt_placement p on p.id=t.placementid where t.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and t.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and t.campaignId = #{campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.profileid = #{profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by t.placementid,t.campaignId,t.profileid
